errors.apiUnavailable: Cannot reach API. Start backend and ensure Jwt:Key is configured.

login.heroTitle: Professional care coordination, built for speed and trust.
login.heroCopy: Access consult schedules, patient appointments, and clinical workflows in one secure workspace.
login.heading: Sign in to your medical workspace
login.subtitle: Use your staff or patient account credentials.

register.heroTitle: Create your secure account and start managing care instantly.
register.heroCopy: Public sign-up creates a patient account with secure access to scheduling and appointment tracking.
register.heading: Create your Medio account
register.subtitle: Complete your profile details to activate access.
register.roleNote: New accounts are created as Patient.

errors.loadClinics: Unable to load clinics. Please try again in a moment.
errors.conflict: An account with this email, username, or personal identifier already exists.
errors.failed: Registration failed. Please review your details and try again.

profile.title: Personal details and identity data
profile.subtitle: Keep your profile up to date so appointment and clinic records remain accurate.
profile.editSubtitle: Only your personal details are editable in this section.

accountSettings.title: Security controls and login credentials
accountSettings.subtitle: Manage sign-in identity, rotate password, and keep account security current.
accountSettings.securitySubtitle: Use this section whenever your account details change.

security.identityCopy: Username and email should stay unique and up to date.
security.passwordCopy: Use current password confirmation to prevent unauthorized changes.
security.credentialsCopy: Use at least 8 characters, with mixed symbols and letters.

accountSettings.editSubtitle: Current password is required for any account update.
accountSettings.passwordMismatch: New password and confirmation must match.

patientDashboard.title: Appointments and care planning in one calendar

patientDashboard.postponeRequestSubtitle: Propose a new date and explain why. Your doctor will review this request.

messages.postponeSent: Postpone request sent to your doctor.

doctorDashboard.title: Consult readiness and schedule control

doctorDashboard.snapshotSubtitle: Keep consult throughput balanced and prioritize follow-up requests before the next session block.
doctorDashboard.noNextConsult: No next consult is scheduled yet. Open consults to review your queue.

appointmentsMy.subtitle: Review upcoming consults, postpone-request status, and completed visits.
appointmentsMy.empty: No appointments found yet. Use Book appointment to schedule your first consult.

availability.title: Doctor availability management
availability.subtitleDoctor: Define your weekly windows, breaks, and one-off exceptions used for appointment slot generation.
availability.subtitleAdmin: Configure any doctor's availability template and date overrides across the clinic.

hints.weeklyAvailability: If empty, the doctor can be booked during clinic operating hours.
hints.emptyWeeklyAvailability: No explicit windows configured. Add windows only if this doctor needs custom hours.
hints.weeklyBreaks: Breaks are subtracted from weekly availability before slots are generated.
hints.dateOverrides: Unavailable overrides can block a full day or a partial time range.

errors.invalidForm: Please complete all required availability fields.
errors.invalidRangeOrder: Each start time must be earlier than its end time.
errors.overlapInAvailability: Weekly availability windows overlap on the same day.
errors.overlapInBreaks: Weekly breaks overlap on the same day.
errors.breakOutsideAvailability: Each weekly break must fit inside an availability window for that day.
errors.overridePartialTime: Override start and end times must both be filled or both left empty.
errors.availableOverrideMissingTime: Available overrides require both start and end time.
errors.overrideRangeOrder: Override start time must be earlier than end time.
errors.duplicateOverride: Duplicate override entries are not allowed.
errors.overrideOverlapAvailable: Available overrides overlap on the same date.
errors.overrideOverlapUnavailable: Unavailable overrides overlap on the same date.
errors.noDoctors: No doctors are available to configure.
errors.noMatchingDoctors: No doctors match the current clinic/search filters.

appointmentsAdmin.title: Cross-clinic appointments

notifications.title: Inbox notifications
notifications.subtitle: Track postpone and cancellation updates that need your attention.

preferences.title: Alert preferences
preferences.hint: Both are disabled by default. Enable only what you want.
